com.apldbio.aga.common.model.objects.Flo.protocolXML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <RunProtocol xmlns="http://aga.apldbio.com/common/runprotocol"> <JobSubmission>SOLiD</JobSubmission>
<Description>Barcode and Sequencing with 5 primer walkaway.</Description> <PreScans> <Prescan> <Module type="fluidic" name="Reset" safe="true"> <Description>Denature the templates with Reset Buffer.</Description> <Script>HOT_RESET_1_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1223</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="P2 Label" safe="true"> <Description>Hybridize Cy-3 labeled p2 oligo.</Description> <Script>SOLiD_LABELED_PRIMER_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>954</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Image Prep" safe="true"> <Description>Wash the flowcell and fill the flowcell with imaging buffer.</Description> <Script>SOLiD_25IB_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>164</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="imaging" name="Focus Map" safe="true"> <Description>Take bead image with Cy-3 for Focal Map.</Description> <Seconds>0</Seconds> </Module> <Description>Focus map with CY3</Description> </Prescan> </PreScans>
<MatePairPrimerSetRecommendedOrders> <MatePairPrimerSetRecommendedOrder name="F3"/> </MatePairPrimerSetRecommendedOrders>
<PEMultiplexPrimerSetRecommendedOrders> <PEMultiplexPrimerSetRecommendedOrder name="BC"/> <PEMultiplexPrimerSetRecommendedOrder name="F5-BC"/> <PEMultiplexPrimerSetRecommendedOrder name="F3"/> </PEMultiplexPrimerSetRecommendedOrders>
<PrimerSets> <PrimerSet name="F3" sequencing="F3"> </PrimerSet> <PrimerSet name="F5-BC" sequencing="F5-BC"> </PrimerSet> <PrimerSet name="BC" sequencing="BC"> </PrimerSet> </PrimerSets>
<Sequencing name="F3"> <PrimerCount>5</PrimerCount> <MaxCycles>10</MaxCycles> <DefaultCycles>5</DefaultCycles> <ProbeSet>12</ProbeSet> <PrimersPerPlate>5</PrimersPerPlate> <WellMappingFile>"FivePrimerWalkaway.plt"</WellMappingFile> <Primers> <Primer name="1" number="1" ligationsetup="ligsetup" ligation="ligF3"/> <Primer name="2" number="2" ligationsetup="ligsetup" ligation="ligF3"/> <Primer name="3" number="3" ligationsetup="nestedligsetup" ligation="ligF3"/> <Primer name="4" number="4" ligationsetup="nestedligsetup" ligation="ligF3"/> <Primer name="5" number="5" ligationsetup="nestedligsetup" ligation="ligF3PE"/> </Primers> </Sequencing>
<Sequencing name="F5-BC"> <PrimerCount>5</PrimerCount> <MaxCycles>7</MaxCycles> <DefaultCycles>5</DefaultCycles> <ProbeSet>12</ProbeSet> <PrimersPerPlate>5</PrimersPerPlate> <WellMappingFile>"FivePrimerWalkaway.plt"</WellMappingFile> <Primers> <Primer name="1" number="1" ligationsetup="ligsetupR" ligation="ligR"/> <Primer name="2" number="2" ligationsetup="ligsetupR" ligation="ligR"/> <Primer name="3" number="3" ligationsetup="nestedligsetupR" ligation="ligR"/> <Primer name="4" number="4" ligationsetup="nestedligsetupR" ligation="ligR"/> <Primer name="5" number="5" ligationsetup="nestedligsetupR" ligation="ligPER"/> </Primers> </Sequencing>
<Sequencing name="BC"> <PrimerCount>5</PrimerCount> <MaxCycles>2</MaxCycles> <DefaultCycles>5</DefaultCycles> <ProbeSet>12</ProbeSet> <PrimersPerPlate>5</PrimersPerPlate> <WellMappingFile>"FivePrimerWalkaway.plt"</WellMappingFile> <Primers> <Primer name="1" number="1" ligationsetup="ligsetupA" ligation="ligBC"/> <Primer name="2" number="2" ligationsetup="ligsetupB" ligation="ligBC"/> <Primer name="3" number="3" ligationsetup="ligsetupC" ligation="ligBC"/> <Primer name="4" number="4" ligationsetup="ligsetupD" ligation="ligBC"/> <Primer name="5" number="5" ligationsetup="ligsetupE" ligation="ligBCPE"/> </Primers> </Sequencing>
<LigationSetup name="ligsetup"> <Description>Hybridize primer.</Description> <Module type="fluidic" name="Reset" safe="true"> <Description>Denature the templates with Reset Buffer.</Description> <Script>HOT_RESET_2_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1120</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Prime/Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Hybridize primer and prepare ligate mix with Probe A for the next module.</Description> <Script>SOLiD_SEQUENCING_PRIMER_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>790</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> </LigationSetup>
<LigationSetup name="nestedligsetup"> <Description>Hybridize primer and add bridge probe.</Description>
<Module type="fluidic" name="Reset" safe="true"> <Description>Denature the templates with Reset Buffer. </Description> <Script>HOT_RESET_2_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1120</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Prime/Bridge Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Hybridize primer and prepare bridge ligate mix for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_SEQUENCING_PRIMER_nested_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>790</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Ligate bridge/Phosphatase Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Add bridge probe by ligation and prepare phosphatase mix for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_LIGATE_nested_tr_265uL_FL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1576</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_nested_tr_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_nested_tr_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Phosphatase bridge" safe="false"> <Description>Phosphatase on bridge probe.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_PHOSPHATASE_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>437</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="150" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PHOSPHATASE_tr_REMIX_265uL_FL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PHOSPHATASE_tr_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Cleave/Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Cleave and prepare ligate mix with Probe A for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_CLEAVE_nested_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>895</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> </LigationSetup>
<LigationSetup name="ligsetupR"> <Description>Hybridize primer.</Description> <Module type="fluidic" name="Reset" safe="true"> <Description>Denature the templates with Reset Buffer.</Description> <Script>HOT_RESET_2_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1120</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Prime/Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Hybridize primer and prepare ligate mix with Probe A for the next module.</Description> <Script>SOLiD_SEQUENCING_PRIMER_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>790</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> </LigationSetup>
<LigationSetup name="nestedligsetupR"> <Description>Hybridize primer and add bridge probe.</Description>
<Module type="fluidic" name="Reset" safe="true"> <Description>Denature the templates with Reset Buffer. </Description> <Script>HOT_RESET_2_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1120</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Prime/Bridge Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Hybridize primer and prepare bridge ligate mix for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_SEQUENCING_PRIMER_nested_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>790</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Ligate bridge/Capper Enzyme Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Add bridge probe by ligation and prepare Capper Enzyme mix for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_LIGATE_nested_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1576</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_nested_RL_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_nested_RL_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Capper Enzyme bridge" safe="false"> <Description>Phosphatase on bridge probe.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_CappingEnzyme_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>663</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="150" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_CappingEnzyme_RL_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_CappingEnzyme_RL_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Cleave/RevPhosphatase Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Cleave and prepare RevPhosphatase mix for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_CLEAVE_nested_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1002</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="RevPhosphatase bridge" safe="false"> <Description>RevPhosphatase.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_RevPhosphatase_nested_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>774</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="150" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_RevPhosphatase_RL_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_RevPhosphatase_RL_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> </LigationSetup>
<LigationSetup name="ligsetupA"> <Description>Hybridize primer A.</Description> <Module type="fluidic" name="Reset" safe="true"> <Description>Denature the templates with Reset Buffer.</Description>
<Script>HOT_RESET_2_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1120</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Prime" safe="true"> <Description>Hybridize primer A.</Description>
<Script>BARCODE_PRIMER_A_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1030</Seconds> </Module> </LigationSetup>
<LigationSetup name="ligsetupB"> <Description>Hybridize primer B.</Description>
<Module type="fluidic" name="Reset" safe="true"> <Description>Denature the templates with Reset Buffer.</Description>
<Script>HOT_RESET_2_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1120</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Prime" safe="true"> <Description>Hybridize primer B.</Description>
<Script>BARCODE_PRIMER_B_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1030</Seconds> </Module> </LigationSetup>
<LigationSetup name="ligsetupC"> <Description>Hybridize primer c.</Description>
<Module type="fluidic" name="Reset" safe="true"> <Description>Denature the templates with Reset Buffer.</Description>
<Script>HOT_RESET_2_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1120</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Prime" safe="true"> <Description>Hybridize primer C.</Description>
<Script>BARCODE_PRIMER_C_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1030</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Ligate bridge C" safe="true"> <Description>Add bridge probe C by ligation.</Description>
<Script>Barcode_bridge_C_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1836</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Phosphatase" safe="true"> <Description>Phosphatase on bridge probe.</Description>
<Script>Barcode_phos_265uL_FL.waa</Script> <Seconds>929</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Cleave" safe="true"> <Description>Cleave.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_CLEAVE_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1101</Seconds> </Module> </LigationSetup>
<LigationSetup name="ligsetupD"> <Description>Hybridize primer D.</Description>
<Module type="fluidic" name="Reset" safe="true"> <Description>Denature the templates with Reset Buffer.</Description>
<Script>HOT_RESET_2_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1120</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Prime" safe="true"> <Description>Hybridize primer D.</Description>
<Script>BARCODE_PRIMER_D_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1030</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Ligate bridge D" safe="true"> <Description>Add bridge probe D by ligation.</Description>
<Script>Barcode_bridge_D_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1836</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Phosphatase" safe="true"> <Description>Phosphatase on bridge probe.</Description>
<Script>Barcode_phos_265uL_FL.waa</Script> <Seconds>929</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Cleave" safe="true"> <Description>Cleave.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_CLEAVE_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1101</Seconds> </Module> </LigationSetup>
<LigationSetup name="ligsetupE"> <Description>Hybridize primer E.</Description>
<Module type="fluidic" name="Reset" safe="true"> <Description>Denature the templates with Reset Buffer.</Description>
<Script>HOT_RESET_2_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1120</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Prime" safe="true"> <Description>Hybridize primer E.</Description>
<Script>BARCODE_PRIMER_E_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1030</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Ligate bridge E" safe="true"> <Description>Add bridge probe E by ligation.</Description>
<Script>Barcode_bridge_E_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1836</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Phosphatase" safe="true"> <Description>Phosphatase on bridge probe.</Description>
<Script>Barcode_phos_265uL_FL.waa</Script> <Seconds>929</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Cleave" safe="true"> <Description>Cleave.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_CLEAVE_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1101</Seconds> </Module> </LigationSetup>
<Ligation name="ligF3"> <Description>ligation cycle. </Description> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Ligate/Dark Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Add Probe A by ligation and prepare Dark Probe Mix for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_LIGATE_12_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>2052</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_tr_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_tr_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Dark Ligate/Phosphatase Mix" safe="false"> <Description> Add Dark Probe by ligation and prepare Phosphatase Mix for the next module. </Description> <Script>SOLiD_DARK_LIGATE_12_tr_265uL_FL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1140</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_DARK_LIGATE_tr_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_DARK_LIGATE_tr_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Phosphatase" safe="false"> <Description>Phosphatase.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_PHOSPHATASE_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>438</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="150" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PHOSPHATASE_tr_REMIX_265uL_FL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PHOSPHATASE_tr_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Only Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Ligate" safe="false"> <Description>Add Probe A by ligation.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_LIGATE_12_LastCycle_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>2215</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_tr_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_tr_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Only Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Wash" safe="true"> <Description>Wash the flowcell with Instrument Buffer and Storage Buffer.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_HOT_WASH_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>498</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Image Prep" safe="true"> <Description>Wash the flowcell and fill the flowcell with imaging buffer.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_25IB_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>177</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="imaging" name="Scan Slide" safe="true"> <Description>Take bead image with four colors.</Description>
<Seconds>0</Seconds> </Module> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Cleave/Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Cleave and prepare ligate mix with Probe A for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_CLEAVE_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1051</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> </Ligation>
<Ligation name="ligF3PE"> <Description>ligation cycle.</Description>
<Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Ligate/Dark Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Add Probe A by ligation and prepare Dark Probe Mix for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_LIGATE_12_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>2052</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_tr_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_tr_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Dark Ligate/Phosphatase Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Add Dark Probe by ligation and prepare Phosphatase Mix for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_DARK_LIGATE_12_tr_265uL_FL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1140</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_DARK_LIGATE_tr_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_DARK_LIGATE_tr_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Phosphatase" safe="false"> <Description>Phosphatase.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_PHOSPHATASE_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>438</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="150" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PHOSPHATASE_tr_REMIX_265uL_FL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PHOSPHATASE_tr_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Only Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Ligate" safe="false"> <Description>Add Probe A by ligation.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_LIGATE_12_LastCycle_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>2215</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_tr_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_tr_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Only Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Wash" safe="true"> <Description>Wash the flowcell with Instrument Buffer and Storage Buffer.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_HOT_WASH_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>498</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Image Prep" safe="true"> <Description>Wash the flowcell and fill the flowcell with imaging buffer.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_25IB_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>177</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="imaging" name="Scan Slide" safe="true"> <Description>Take bead image with four colors.</Description>
<Seconds>0</Seconds> </Module> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Cleave/Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Cleave and prepare ligate mix with Probe A for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_CLEAVE_tr_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1051</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Only Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Store" safe="true"> <Description>Fill the flowcell with Storage Buffer.</Description>
<Script>Turbo_SOLiD_STORE.waa</Script> <Seconds>72</Seconds> </Module> </Ligation>
<Ligation name="ligR"> <Description>ligation cycle. </Description> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Ligate/Dark Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Add Probe A by ligation and prepare Dark Probe Mix for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_LIGATE_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>2587</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_RL_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_RL_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Dark Ligate/Capper Enzyme Mix" safe="false"> <Description> Add Dark Probe by ligation and prepare Capper Enzyme Mix for the next module. </Description> <Script>SOLiD_DARK_LIGATE_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>2143</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_DARK_LIGATE_RL_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_DARK_LIGATE_RL_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Capper Enzyme" safe="false"> <Description>Capper Enzyme.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_CappingEnzyme_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>664</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="150" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_CappingEnzyme_RL_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_CappingEnzyme_RL_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Only Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Ligate" safe="false"> <Description>Add Probe A by ligation.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_LIGATE_RL_LastCycle_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>2861</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="200" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_RL_REMIX_265uL.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_LIGATE_RL_RESUME.waa"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Only Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Wash" safe="true"> <Description>Wash the flowcell with Instrument Buffer and Storage Buffer.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_HOT_WASH_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>470</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="fluidic" name="Image Prep" safe="true"> <Description>Wash the flowcell and fill the flowcell with imaging buffer.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_25IB_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>164</Seconds> </Module> <Module type="imaging" name="Scan Slide" safe="true"> <Description>Take bead image with four colors.</Description>
<Seconds>0</Seconds> </Module> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Cleave/RevPhosphatase Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Cleave and prepare RevPhosphatase mix for the next module.</Description>
<Script>SOLiD_CLEAVE_RL_265uL.waa</Script> <Seconds>1083</Seconds> <ExtraScript name="RemixScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="ResumeScript" Seconds="0"/> <ExtraScript name="PauseScript" Seconds="3" ScriptFileName="SOLiD_PAUSE.waa"/> </Module> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="RevPhosphatase/Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Add Probe A by ligation and prepare Dark Probe Mix for the next module.</Description>

<Ligation name="ligPER"> <Description>ligation cycle. </Description> <Module conditional="Not Last Cycle" type="fluidic" name="Ligate/Dark Ligate Mix" safe="false"> <Description>Add Probe A by ligation and prepare Dark Probe Mix for the next module.</Description>
